short_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/minecraft/stag: The chicken is frozen. Place `move` and `turn` blocks in the `when spawned` slot to get it to move.
Great, the chicken moved! But then she stopped. In games, chickens walk forever. Use a `forever do` loop to keep these chickens moving.
Now the chickens look weird moving the same way. Games use random moves to make things look real. Make the chickens `turn random`.
Let's explore our world! Move with the arrows, and press the space bar or tap the game board to use items. Use the door to get inside the house.
In Minecraft, sheep drop wool. Place the `drop` block in `when used`, then walk over and use the sheep to drop an item.
These cows are lost! Lead them to the grass with the `move a step toward` block in a `forever do` loop.
The path to your sheep is blocked by a stone wall. Luckily there is a Creeper here. Creepers explode after you touch them. Get the Creeper to explode the wall so you can reach your sheep!
Oh no! Zombies have trapped you inside! Code the Iron Golem to chase and attack the zombies!
Now you can fill the world with what you want! Place`spawn` blocks under `when run` to spawn things when the game starts.
Now you make the zombies. Use the `spawn` block to make 3 zombies when night falls. Get them to move towards you. Survive until morning.
Some games let you keep score. Play tag with these Iron Golems and use the `add 1 to score` block to give yourself a point when you tag them. Reach five points to win!
It's time to make your own Minecraft! Spawn creatures and then make them do whatever you want. Have fun!

long_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/minecraft/stag:
Some games let you keep score. Play tag with these Iron Golems and use the <xml>  <block type="craft_addScore">
    <title name="SCORE">1</title>
  </block></xml> block to give yourself a point when you tag them.  

  Reach five points to win!

failure_message_overrides.https://studio.code.org/s/minecraft/stag: Use `move forward` and `turn` commands to get your chicken moving.
Use a `forever do` block and `move forward` and `turn` commands to keep your chicken wandering.
If the chickens are all moving in the same direction, use `turn random` to make the chickens turn randomly left or right.
To open the door, press the space bar or touch the game board while facing it. Walk inside to continue.
Use the arrow keys to walk to the sheep and press space bar or click the game board to use the sheep. And, don’t forget to add the 'Drop' block to your code.
Try using 'Forever Do' with 'Move a Step Toward the Player'.
You need to use the exploding Creeper to blow up the wall so you can reach your sheep.
You need to make the Iron Golem chase and attack the zombies to win.

Use the `spawn zombie` command under `when night` to spawn at least three zombies. Then, add `move a step toward player` to their `when spawned` event with a loop to help them chase you. If they’re too fast, add a `wait` command to slow them down.
If you're having trouble tagging 5 Golems, try changing the score to 2 per tag.
